channel.title: CVE Feed for CryoutCreations -- Verbosa
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CryoutCreations -- Verbosa

item.title: CVE-2024-44050|2024-09-17T22:20:34.410Z -- cryoutcreations -- verbosa
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CryoutCreations Verbosa allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Verbosa: from n/a through 1.2.3.
